name: Poly Craft - Match Animal
description:
"Poly Craft" is a brand new tile matching game! It’s not an ordinary mahjong or matching games , but will offer you a completely new game play. Match 2 same tiles to solve challenging puzzles. It’s easy at the beginning and as you progress you will face a lot challenging levels. Game always need good logic and strategy to solve levels. Once you master the skills, you will enjoy the exciting game. "Poly Craft" suits very well for all ages.

How to Play:

Tap and move any tile onto the board. Match 2 same tiles on the board to clear it. Do clearing as fast as possible to collect more stars. Puzzle will complete when all tiles are cleared. Game will fails if you have five or more tiles on the board.
